checked.description: Determines if the checkbox is checked or not.
checked.name: checked

defaultChecked.description:
Initial checked value of the checkbox. Only use this when you need to
pre-populate the checked attribute that is not controlled by the component's
state. If a state is controlling it, use the `checked` prop instead.
defaultChecked.name: defaultChecked

indeterminate.description: When `true` the checkbox to appears in indeterminate.
indeterminate.name: indeterminate

ariaLabel.description:
Defines a string value that labels the current element.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-label}
ariaLabel.name: ariaLabel

ariaLabelledBy.description:
Identifies the element (or elements) that labels the current element.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-labelledby}
ariaLabelledBy.name: ariaLabelledBy

ariaDescribedBy.description:
Identifies the element (or elements) that describes the object.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-describedby}
ariaDescribedBy.name: ariaDescribedBy

ariaDetails.description:
Identifies the element (or elements) that provide a detailed, extended description.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-details}
ariaDetails.name: ariaDetails

ariaActiveDescendant.name: ariaActiveDescendant

ariaControls.description:
Indicates the element that controls the current element.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-controls}
ariaControls.name: ariaControls

ariaExpanded.description:
Indicates whether the element is expanded or collapsed.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-expanded}
ariaExpanded.name: ariaExpanded

ariaAutocomplete.description:
Indicates the type of autocomplete interaction.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-autocomplete}
ariaAutocomplete.name: ariaAutocomplete

ariaRequired.description:
Indicates that user input is required before form submission.
@see {@link https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-1.2/#aria-required}
ariaRequired.name: ariaRequired

label.description:
Label that shows up beside the checkbox.
String will be rendered with the default markup.
ReactElement will be rendered with provided positionining.
label.name: label

description.description:
Additional description of the checkbox.
String will be rendered with the default markup.
ReactElement will be rendered with provided positioning.
description.name: description

onChange.description:
Called when the checkbox value changes.
Includes the change event as a second argument.
onChange.name: onChange

version.description: Version 2 is highly experimental, avoid using it unless you have talked with Atlantis first.
version.name: version

ref.name: ref
